data.text: @PritiMcbeth @whyohwhyfather @guardian the U.K. Is not a charity. How many more refugees should they take in exactly?
@vaydogga @whyohwhyfather @guardian I don't think even you know what you are talking about...
@whyohwhyfather @PritiMcbeth @guardian is responsible for 58% of worlds welfare. I wonder y they flock there.
@whyohwhyfather @PritiMcbeth @guardian all countries in the world gave socialism to an extent. Europe makes up about 7% of worlds pop and
@vaydogga @PritiMcbeth @guardian So most of western Europe most of which of which to my knowledge don't have socialist governments. Can you see a flaw in your logic?
@PritiMcbeth @whyohwhyfather @guardian maybe u should think for yourself and do what's best for your nation.
@vaydogga @whyohwhyfather @guardian Once again think for yourself and stop peddling rubbish you have read in Kippers leaflets .thankfully we don't need to hear from them again
@whyohwhyfather @PritiMcbeth @guardian I meant most socialist. But I would say countries like France, Germany, Sweden etc.
@vaydogga @PritiMcbeth @guardian I'm really interested from a European perspective,  which states in Europe would you consider "socialist?"
@PritiMcbeth @whyohwhyfather @guardian that's what socialism does. It squanders money. Accepting influxes of migrants creates ghettos.
@vaydogga @whyohwhyfather @guardian Successive governments have let the people down. The money is there but not distributed evenly. It's easy to blame foreigners 🙄
@PritiMcbeth @whyohwhyfather @guardian these migrants aren't even escaping war zones. A tiny minority are actually from Syria. No sympathy.
@PritiMcbeth @whyohwhyfather @guardian governments are meant to protect their own ppl. Not let other ppl exploit them 4 taxpayer money.
@guardian Brexit doesnt mean end to UK accepting refugees & ban on all immigration-why the bizarre comment? & why is Guardian pushing this propaganda?
@guardian Too many So called Brits have little idea of what is happening goat the end of the street far less the rest of the world
@guardian Some of these comments miss the point she is making
@guardian That play is probably Boris Vian's The Empire Builders. https://t.co/9Jm0KZk0Ji
@guardian @simonisrael That's comforting for those dieing she puts it on same level isn't it..
@guardian She maybe right but why is her hair sticking out like that? Is that like a wind effect?
@vaydogga @whyohwhyfather @guardian It's everyone's fecking planet.. just for a minute imagine it was you.. you would want a country with the best prospects for your family🙄
@guardian In reality most people here are immigrants ...
@vaydogga @PritiMcbeth @guardian You made the claim so provide the evidence?

@Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian sweeping comments ..so you know all these people personally!  
Good/ bad peoples everywhere. Life is too short to be angry.
@whyohwhyfather @PritiMcbeth @guardian no I'm not.
@guardian champagne socialist celebs piss me off.
@Alexilkbir @guardian hahahahahahaha
@vaydogga @PritiMcbeth @guardian And there you are wrong.
@PritiMcbeth @whyohwhyfather @guardian real refugees r entitled to flee to the closest safe nation. Not any nation with big welfare state
@Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian Why?  What do you base this argument on.  Do you have a crystal ball or are you just full of hate
@Commentator_PL @PritiMcbeth @guardian I must disagree with you, have a great weekend.
@PritiMcbeth @Commentator_PL @guardian Nice one Priti.
@Commentator_PL @PritiMcbeth @guardian Please just because you can hear the voices we can't reply as we only have what you tweet.
@Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian I don't think anyone gets you.  You don't need refugees to live in your home but elect governments and pay taxes to do the moral thing
@EngineerEarth Block me as a troll because I redule your stupidity? Please do.
@EngineerEarth @PritiMcbeth @Commentator_PL @guardian You simplistic biary world view is rather sad?
@Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian Yeah came last week and paid lots into the system overnight  🙄.. ok I'm done .. have a lovely weekend
@PritiMcbeth @Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian People don't want to be forced out of fear to leave their homes they want outside actors-governments to stop CAUSING their horrors.
@EngineerEarth @PritiMcbeth @Commentator_PL @guardian Hunger Games, you need to get out more.
@PritiMcbeth @Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian If you aren't working to fix the cause you are perpetuating the suffering while quelling your own personal guilt & seeking to pass it off.
@PritiMcbeth @Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian So work to end the cause=the politicians who want poor people already suffering to live in a Hunger Games environment they profit from.
@Commentator_PL @PritiMcbeth @guardian So why did you ask a question that you knew the answer to? As she never said that. It's childish.
@Commentator_PL @guardian Logic? My arse.
@Commentator_PL @PritiMcbeth @guardian No she did not say that, oh bless.

@Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian Get to spec savers mate .
My family came here as refugees .. ❤️this country..worked hard and paid lots into the system. Law abiding  citizen
@Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian Oh no you've been listening to Kippers..
@Commentator_PL @whyohwhyfather @guardian why are you putting everyone in 'one pot'. Refugees are not illegal they are fleeing mayhem ie wars,persecution,natural disaster etc.
@Commentator_PL @guardian You don't need refugees living in your house .. stop talking rubbish
@guardian Another celeb that lives behind a gated community with no idea of life in real world .
@Commentator_PL @guardian a fire brigade does that mean I have to have a fire engine in my back garden before I can say this? 2/2
@guardian #Brexit IS a death! It is the death of Freedom, the death of Equality, the death of Brotherhood...Values many fought and died for!
@Commentator_PL @guardian Oh bless nice to see the arguments of the playground still live. Its about society not individuals. I want 1/2
@guardian Randomness of life & death, 2 weeks later & Ms Weisz probably wouldn't be here. No wonder Jews always have a suitcase metaphorically packed.
@guardian Noone is against all refugees.Blame islamists for the growing negative trend to https://t.co/GoM2QNIVxN do you really expect people to feel
@guardian Learn to live with death Ms Rachel
